manual/SerializableDictionary.html.keywords: Usage Guide for the Serializable Dictionary We've used azixMcAze's implementation: https://github.com/azixMcAze/Unity-SerializableDictionary Instructions Subclass SerializableDictionary . Generic classes won't be serialized. cs [System.Serializable] public class StringStringDictionary : SerializableDictionary<string, string> { } Subclass SerializableDictionaryPropertyDrawer in the Editor folder. Add the CustomPropertyDrawer attribute. cs [UnityEditor.CustomPropertyDrawer(typeof(StringStringDictionary))] public class StringStringPropertyDrawer : SerializableDictionaryPropertyDrawer { }
